category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, reduces pathogenic Fire and resolves Blood Stagnation

indications: Hematemesis, nose bleeding, noma, pharyngitis, pulmonary asthenia, aphthae, consumptive fever, sore throat, mouth and gum ulcers, gingivitis, headaches

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency Cold.

notes: This herb is used for a wide variety of conditions characterized by Heat in the Upper, Middle and Lower Jiaos.
It is used alone for edema.
